COMMODITY.Definition: a product that is bought and sold

CAFFEINE.Definition: the substance in coffee and tea that makes you feel more active

HERDER.Definition: a farmer of cows, goats, sheep etc.

TA-DA.Definition: used to indicate that something has arrived

MYSTIC.Definition: a religious person who spends a lot of time praying

POTION.Definition: a liquid with a magical effect

VIRGINS.Definition: people who have never had sex

PENINSULA.Definition: a piece of land surrounded by water

PILGRIMAGES.Definition: special journeys made for religious reasons

CONSUMPTION.Definition: the eating or drinking (of a substance)

STAPLE.Definition: food that is used a lot

ORDER.Definition: (of a religion) a society or group

FATE.Definition: what happens to a person or thing

CONCOCTION.Definition: a food or drink created by mixing different things

BAPTISING.Definition: introducing someone or something into the church

APOTHECARIES.Definition: people who mixed and sold medicines

GO-TO.Definition: the best or most popular person or thing for a particular task

PROHIBITIVELY.Definition: in a way that is too great that is prevents you from doing something

PLANTATION.Definition: a large farm where a particular crop is grown

MONOPOLY.Definition: a group that has complete control over a particular thing

PLANTATIONS.Definition: large farms where particular crops are grown

UNPATRIOTIC.Definition: not showing a love for your country

TRAJECTORY.Definition: the path that something goes on

ENSLAVEMENT.Definition: the act of making someone a slave

CROPS.Definition: plants such as fruits or vegetables, grown in large amounts to be eaten
